snippet: A senior South Korean policy maker said on Friday that it must be assumed that Pyongyang has the capacity to mount a nuclear device on a ballistic missile.
abstract: South Korean policy maker says it must be assumed that North Korea has capacity to mount a nuclear device on ballistic missile, adding that such a capability poses a threat to South Korea; stresses that reliable information about North Korea's capabilities is scarce, and he cautions that he is not confirming that it had built an operational nuclear weapon.
lead_paragraph: A senior South Korean policy maker said on Friday that it must be assumed that Pyongyang has the capacity to mount a nuclear device on a ballistic missile.

headline.seo: South Korean Official Says North’s Missile Program Could Be ‘Existential Threat’
headline.main: South Korean Official Warns of ‘Existential Threat’ From North
